content: [TextBlock(text='"Just got home and my new smart home robot, Robby, greeted me with a personalized welcome message. \\ud83e\\udd16 #TechJourney It\'s like having a friend who never forgets anything. I\'ve been setting up routines for him - he\'ll now remind me to water my plants, turn off lights, and even prepare my coffee in the morning. It\'s strange at first, but there\'s comfort in knowing someone\'s looking out for you, even if they\'re made of circuits. I programmed him to share some of Z\'s favorite quotes from time to time, keeping Z\'s memory alive in my daily life. #InMemoryOfZ"', type='text')]
